metadata.synopsis: Astarion and Jaheira discuss the area where Jaheira lives (or something like that).

2.speaker: Astarion
2.text: Cazador always warned us to stay clear of this neighbourhood. Never said why, though.
2.context: NodeContext: A little abashed, but shrugging it off

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: The last spawn who tried was sunk into the cobblestones and left for the sun to find. I had an unfortunate taste for theatrics, in my youth.
0.context: NodeContext: A little abashed, but shrugging it off

1.speaker: Astarion
1.text: Ah. Yes, that was probably it.
